name: fetch_web_screenshot
description: Captures screenshots using a full headless browser for complete page rendering including JavaScript, CSS animations, and dynamic content. Returns visual representation of the rendered page. Use this when you need to see how content appears visually (e.g., GitHub repository pages, web apps, dashboards). For static image files or direct downloads, use download_resource instead. For text content extraction, use fetch_web_page.
author: BB Team
